**Installing R Packages**


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(ggrepel, patchwork, 
               ggthemes, hrbrthemes,
               tidyverse,ggplot2)
```
:::


**Loading Data**


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")
```
:::


Visualing Histogram



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, 
           y=ENGLISH)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method=lm, 
              size=0.5) +  
  geom_label(aes(label = ID), 
             hjust = .5, 
             vjust = -.5) +
  coord_cartesian(xlim=c(0,100),
                  ylim=c(0,100)) +
  ggtitle("English scores versus Maths scores for Primary 3")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, 
           y=ENGLISH)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method=lm, 
              size=0.5) +  
  geom_label_repel(aes(label = ID), 
                   fontface = "bold") +
  coord_cartesian(xlim=c(0,100),
                  ylim=c(0,100)) +
  ggtitle("English scores versus Maths scores for Primary 3")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
             aes(x = MATHS)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20, 
                 boundary = 100,
                 color="grey25", 
                 fill="grey90") +
  theme_gray() +
  ggtitle("Distribution of Maths scores") 
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
             aes(x = MATHS)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20, 
                 boundary = 100,
                 color="grey25", 
                 fill="grey90") +
  ggtitle("Distribution of Maths scores") +
  theme_economist()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
             aes(x = MATHS)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20, 
                 boundary = 100,
                 color="grey25", 
                 fill="grey90") +
  ggtitle("Distribution of Maths scores") +
  theme_ipsum()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
             aes(x = MATHS)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20, 
                 boundary = 100,
                 color="grey25", 
                 fill="grey90") +
  ggtitle("Distribution of Maths scores") +
  theme_ipsum(axis_title_size = 18,
              base_size = 15,
              grid = "Y")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
p1 <- ggplot(data=exam_data, 
             aes(x = MATHS)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20, 
                 boundary = 100,
                 color="grey25", 
                 fill="grey90") + 
  coord_cartesian(xlim=c(0,100)) +
  ggtitle("Distribution of Maths scores")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
p2 <- ggplot(data=exam_data, 
             aes(x = ENGLISH)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20, 
                 boundary = 100,
                 color="grey25", 
                 fill="grey90") +
  coord_cartesian(xlim=c(0,100)) +
  ggtitle("Distribution of English scores")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
p3 <- ggplot(data=exam_data, 
             aes(x= MATHS, 
                 y=ENGLISH)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method=lm, 
              size=0.5) +  
  coord_cartesian(xlim=c(0,100),
                  ylim=c(0,100)) +
  ggtitle("English scores versus Maths scores for Primary 3")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
p1 + p2
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-12-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
((p1 / p2) | p3) + 
  plot_annotation(tag_levels = 'I')
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-13-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
p3 + inset_element(p2, 
                   left = 0.02, 
                   bottom = 0.7, 
                   right = 0.5, 
                   top = 1)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-14-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
patchwork <- (p1 / p2) | p3
patchwork & theme_economist()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-15-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

:::

::: {.cell}

:::
